Name: Restaurant District 5
Review Text: Fantastic charming local italian eatery.  We managed to get a last minute reservation.  Great atmosphere - the service was prompt and attentive. …

Name: Restaurant District 5
Review Text: Pizza is good, very thin and well cooked. A bit oily a when crowded it can be a very long wait. Prices are OK for Amsterdam, roughly 30EUR for 2 people for pizza and beer.

Name: Restaurant District 5
Review Text: Used to be one of our favorite Italian restaurants in Amsterdam. Unfortunately, the place really went downhill in the last year... really slow service (1 hour wait just for the starter), mediocre food and prices way way higher than the quality you get. I would not recommend this place.

Name: Restaurant District 5
Review Text: Tried the pizza, really best I had in Amsterdam. Service was good and friendly. Prices are a little higher than average restaurants in Amsterdam, but quality was superb.

Name: Restaurant District 5
Review Text: Best pizza in the area. Really good atmosphere food and service was excellent. We went with kids and we were all looked after really well. Highly recommend District 5.

Name: Restaurant District 5
Review Text: Love this place. We come here all the time. It's a local family owned restaurant with great pizza, good service and very relaxed atmosphere.

Name: Restaurant District 5
Review Text: Nice Italian place with authentic food. Service is the typical take-your-time Dutch style, but the atmosphere is nice and the food good.

Name: Restaurant District 5
Review Text: Best pizza in Amsterdam! I live around the corner and come here often. I'd definitly reccomend this italian.

Name: Restaurant District 5
Review Text: One of the few places where food tastes mediterranean, 3 course menu, 32 euro, beverages not in. Service really good.

Name: Restaurant District 5
Review Text: Very good Italian cuisine and pizzas. Lovely outdoor dining and nice indoor atmosphere

Name: Restaurant District 5
Review Text: Very nice Italian place. Excellent pizza's and superfriendly staff.

Name: Restaurant District 5
Review Text: Great tasting authentic Italian food. Don't be in a hurry, it is worth the wait!

Name: Restaurant District 5
Review Text: Best pizza in Amsterdam returning again 2 days in a row, would highly recommend.

Name: Restaurant District 5
Review Text: Good handmade pizza. Slow service when busy, but very friendly.

Name: Restaurant District 5
Review Text: Monday only pizza but they are great :)

Name: Restaurant District 5
Review Text: Excellent service, ambiance and bread. My main dish (spaghetti vongole was good but not great, as the cherry tomatoes overwhelmed the clams.

Name: Restaurant District 5
Review Text: Everything very good except service.

Name: Restaurant District 5
